title: Autamata - My Sanctuary; Tales from My Sanctuary; Colours of Sou
description:
Ken McHugh is Autamata. Included are three CDs ripped to FLAC and tagged.

"My Sanctuary" is the first Autamata album. It is the product of a fantastic collaboration with vocalists Carol Keogh and Cathy Davey and attracted much praise and good reviews.

"Tales from My Sanctuary" is the EP associated with the above, and includes remixes of tracks from the Album and a track not found in "My Sanctuary", "Where the Heart Is".

"Colours of Sound" is the second album, and has a very different sound. It lacks the vocal input of "My Sanctuary" but is still worth having.

If you like the music, buy McHugh's stuff and attend his events: small artists get a hard time in Ireland.

Seedboxes and VPNs are cheap, but if you feel like helping out:
bitcoin:1LG5NR5SxDSFsH7HoKwjfXLkwRxMws9Gog
